overview: After months of media attention we're at it again! A group of SoCal students wanted to show us that they could party even harder than the students in Campus Invasion. As the guys lined up for blowjobs from Calli and Taylor, Nacho got the girls' panties wet by fucking Brittney in front of a room of cheering fans. We even brought a special guest - America's #1 porn star, Ron Jeremy, to mix things up. Don't miss the special Porn Star Date, where one student takes out Cindy and Mariah and pick which babe he bangs. It's time to tap the keg...College Invasion - The Series is here!!!
title: College Invasion 1
